title: Wandersong-TiNYiSO
description:
Proudly Presents

Wandersong
(c) Greg Lobanov

Release On: 16 October 2018 Disk Amount/Format: 1 Disc
Type of Game: Adventure Media Protection: Nothing

A musical adventure where you use singing to save the world! Play as a
silly bard who embarks on a globe-trotting journey to learn about the
mysterious Earthsong, said to be able to prevent the universe s imminent
end. Along the way there s a huge cast of characters to meet, puzzles to
solve and songs to sing!

In Wandersong you're a walking musical instrument, and you use song to
interact with everything. Different things respond to your music in
different ways, so it's up to you to sing your songs, unlock the world's
secrets and make new friends!

FEATURES

10-12 hours of adventure!
Use singing to interact with the world!
150+ characters to meet and discover!
150+ characters to annoy with your singing!
The DANCE BUTTON... dance anytime, anywhere!
Whimsy!
Fully accessible to color-blind and deaf players!

Burn/mount, install, play!

Greetz: LARGEiSO and MEDIUMiSO

(C) E/dfs
" SIZE DOES NOT MATTER! "
